#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    
    int t; cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        long n; cin>>n;
        bool inc=true;
        bool dec=true;
        if(n/10==0)
        cout<<"0"<<endl;
        else
        {
        while(n!=0)
        {
            int x=n%10;
            n=n/10;
            int y=n%10;
            if(x>=y)
            inc=false;
            else
            dec=false;
        }
        if(inc==false && dec==false)
        cout<<"1"<<endl;
        else
        cout<<"0"<<endl;
    }
    }
    return 0;
}
